index_terms: LAND USE PLANNING AND REGULATORY AGENCIES
summary: Relating to the Building Dept.; assigning the functions of the Dept. of General Services to the Superintendent of Buildings, establishing, transferring, and abolishing certain positions in connection therewith, fixing compensation and providing payment therefor, Authorizing Expenditures, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor, and repealing Ordinance 97475 and other ordinances in conflict therewith.
